title: Is life and death: reimagined any different from the original twilight book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everything is same, except.. there is a gender swap & the end is different. Life and Death is mirror story of the Twilight. The scenes, the dialogues.. everything remains same. Edward (Edythe) is a girl vampire. Bella (Beau) is guy. And it sort of shows how the story would have ended if Edward would have turned Bella into a vampire when she was attacked by James.

It's not that different from twilight…the plot is almost the same..apart from the fact that the genders of the characters have been changed… Like Bella is replaced by a 17 yr old guy Beaufort Swan nd Edward has been replaced by an alluring telepathic vampire Edythe Cullen.And d book ends with Beaufort becoming a vampire in contrast to twilight where Edward saved bella's life.
